snippet: A monster dunk (or was it even a dunk?) by the Los Angeles Clippers star prompted numerous posts.
abstract: A monster dunk (or was it even a dunk?) by the Los Angeles Clippers star prompted numerous posts.
lead_paragraph: In the same week that Blake Griffin's legend grew larger with a monster dunk (or extremely short-range jump shot) over Kendrick Perkins of Oklahoma City, he announced that he would not defend his slam-dunk title at this year's All-Star festivities.
